short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple auto login script for Victoria University

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** REQUIRES ACCESS TO VICTORIA UNIVERSITY MyVU **

An automatic login script to bypass the annoying MyVU Login page. Enter your email ONCE, and then never again thanks to this handy extension!

(This does not bypass the need for a password if required or authenticator)
